title: From Rural Canada to IGN: The Mitch Dyer Story - Kinda Funny Gamescast Ep. 65 (Pt. 1)
description:
Mitch Dyer was a kid in Canada who stumbled into writing about games. How'd this farm boy do it? Let's find out.
